name: Soul Bandit
description:
I had this idea at the beggining of the game jam where you would be stuck in a slot machine. I had a very simple idea, but I underestimated my skills. This is my very first game, I'm really new to everything. Took me like 12 hours to make the animations and now I need some sleep. The game I think it's pretty cool, but I might be biased. Thank you.

Helpers:

Music:  BeepBox

Sound: jsfxr

Art: Photoshop, Pixabay

Game Engine: Unity
